Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Our product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet the needs of industry leaders like yourself. Given its exceptional capabilities and the impact it could have on your company, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $1350000.

This offer represents a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate, considering the product's true worth to you stands at $1200000. We are confident that by accepting this offer, you will not only maximize your investment but also gain a strategic advantage in your market.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the specifics of the product, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the success of your organization.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
